title: IoT-based Water Pipe Leak Detection Device
description: Contributed to the development of an IoT-connected leak detection device. Participated in selecting components, assembling circuits, and programming for real-time data monitoring.

title: IoT-based Temperature Monitoring System
description: Helped build an IoT-enabled temperature monitoring system with LCD display and buzzer alert. Participated in planning, wiring, and basic code development for sensor integration.

title: Automated Storage and Retrieval System (ASRS)
description: Involved in the development of an Automated Storage and Retrieval System. Programmed PLC Haiwell for system control, contributed to mechanical design and wiring, and helped source compatible components during internship.
